subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer claimed a record-tying 19th Masters 1000 title by beating John Isner in the final of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
snippet: Roger Federer claimed a record-tying 19th Masters 1000 title by beating John Isner in the final of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
